:v-model.description: The identifier of the currently selected item

disabled.description: Whether to disable all radio boxes

direction.description_zh: 排列方向，可选值为 horizontal

icon-size.description: The icon size of all radio boxes, with the default unit being px
icon-size.description_zh: 所有单选框的图标大小，默认单位为 px

checked-color.description: The color of the selected status for all radio boxes
checked-color.description_zh: 所有单选框的选中状态颜色

events.name: change
events.description: An event that is triggered when a binding value changes
events.description_zh: 当绑定值变化时触发的事件
